page.title: 02 Recreation.
page.content:
Village Activities.
During the year I go to some of the many things going on in Prestbury. Every Tuesday evening I go to Youth Club where there are games and a tuck shop.In June there is a Family Hoedown at school. Also on Tuesday evenings there is a Badminton Club for children and teenagers. One highly celebrated day is the Rose Queen Festival in June.The young ones form a procession from Dale Brow through the village to Bollin Grove School where their parents are.There are sideshows and games. The village has a Flower Club a National Housewive's Register a Women's Institute and a Luncheon Club plus many more. Prestbury is a family village where lots of things go on.
